banner.title: About Us
banner.description: Protecting your privacy in every connection.

aboutUs.title: Who we are
aboutUs.description: We are specialists in secure communication equipment and software, such as phones, applications, and SIM cards. We aim to bring digital security closer to anyone or any company looking to protect their information and privacy. We work with the most secure and recognized systems around the world, which have been tested for years and proven to be impenetrable.

communicationCard.title: Secure communication without borders
communicationCard.description: We have an extensive network of resellers and distributors in North America, South America, and Europe that bring Encriptados' solutions to those who need them, so more people can benefit from the advantages of secure communications.

privacyCard.title: We take your privacy seriously
privacyCard.description: We are always at the forefront of new technologies to offer you fully impenetrable and easy-to-use encrypted communications. We help corporations, businesses, government institutions, celebrities, lawyers, travelers, and individuals who want to improve their cybersecurity.

informationCard.title: Your personal information will never reach third parties
informationCard.description: With Encriptados, you'll have a private network provider that ensures your security and guarantees greater privacy by preventing your information from being manipulated, shared, or sold.

simSelection.mainTitle: Where will you use your SIM?
simSelection.subtitle: Connect to the Internet with your SIM or eSIM in over 200 countries. Enjoy secure internet with total anonymity.

q1.question: Which devices are compatible with the SIM?
q1.answer: The SIM works with most unlocked phones and tablets. You just need your device to support your local operator's band.

q2.question: How do I activate my SIM after purchasing it?
q2.answer: You will receive step-by-step instructions via email and within the app. Usually you just need to scan a code or follow a quick guide.

q3.question: Can I use it in multiple countries?
q3.answer: Yes. Depending on the plan you contract, you can use the SIM in different countries without changing your number or losing your data balance.

q4.question: Is my personal information recorded?
q4.answer: We don't ask for unnecessary sensitive information. Our focus is on keeping your browsing as private as possible.

q5.question: What happens if I run out of data?
q5.answer: You can recharge your plan from the app or website at any time, without losing your SIM or needing to reactivate it.

q6.question: Is there support if I have activation problems?
q6.answer: Yes. We have chat and email support to help you with installation, activation and use of your SIM.

elements.title: Self-destructing messages
elements.description: Messages are automatically deleted from sending and receiving devices after a «recording time». You can choose this time: From one minute to 90 days.

elements.title: Encrypted voice notes
elements.description: Voice notes with the ability to record and provide a secure alternative to voicemail.

elements.title: Secure messages
elements.description: Encryption ensures that only the receiving device can interpret communications from the moment you press "SEND". The sender can verify if the message was received and read.

elements.title: Files and documents
elements.description:
Encrypted file sharing… securely send up to 100 MB.

armadillo.description: Highly secure instant messaging application that respects your privacy

elements.title: Encrypted Chats
elements.description: Armadillo Chat uses end-to-end encryption, so your messages are unreadable even if the server is compromised.

elements.title: Remote and Automated Deletion
elements.description: Automatically configure self-destruct timers, remotely delete individual messages or entire conversations

elements.title: Encrypted Communications
elements.description: You can communicate with text messages, images, files, group chats or video calls securely.

elements.title: Verify the identity of your contacts
elements.description: You can use various methods to verify your friends' identities: scan a QR code, ask a question, Wi-Fi verification, or text verification.

benefits.title: Easy account access
benefits.description: Activate or renew your Armadillo Chat account to ensure you have the most secure software, communications, and support.

benefits.title: 24/7 Support
benefits.description: You can also speak directly with our mobile security experts via Armadillo Chat about your security concerns.

benefits.title: Simple interface
benefits.description: Armadillo Chat is not only a completely secure application, it is also very easy to use.

benefits.title: Privacy and security
benefits.description: Armadillo Chat is a highly secure instant messaging application. With constant updates, we ensure that all your communications are private and out of reach of any malicious third parties.

benefits.title: Alerts about potential imposters
benefits.description: Armadillo Chat automatically warns you about potential imposters in your contact list and other devices connected to your account. In high-security mode, it will also warn you about any unverified friends.

benefits.title: Push Notifications
benefits.description: Armadillo Chat is not only a completely secure application, it is also very easy to use.

armadillo.information: Armadillo Chat. Highly secure instant messaging application

Why use Armadillo Chat?

valutChat.description: Optimized encrypted communication platform with high-end multi-layer encryption.

elements.title: Encrypted Chats
elements.description: Communicate quickly and internally encrypted with other VaultChat users. Send and receive images and voice notes and conduct group chats.

elements.title: Encrypted Chat
elements.description: We have implemented OMEMO / ECC / AES256 in our popular chat system. No message can be read on our server by anyone at any time! We have the best encryption and do not store data. All images and voice notes are also encrypted!

elements.title: Self-Destructing Messages
elements.description: Self-destructing messages take precedence over everything. Set your timer to destroy all messages when the time runs out.

elements.title: Broadcast Lists
elements.description: With the broadcast list feature, you can send an encrypted message to multiple of your contacts at once. Broadcast lists are saved lists of message recipients to whom you can repeatedly send broadcast messages without having to select them each time.

benefits.title: Private Notifications
benefits.description: Maintain the confidentiality of message arrival times and counts by choosing push notifications to originate from our servers.

benefits.title: State-of-the-art features
benefits.description: VaultChat is packed with features and security. We offer state-of-the-art products for your use.

benefits.title: 24/7 Monitoring
benefits.description: Infrastructure security monitoring provides network protection with preventative measures to deny unauthorized access and malicious activity.

benefits.title: Encrypted Data at Rest
benefits.description: All data stored in VaultChat is encrypted using a custom encrypted database with AES-256.

benefits.title: Password Protection
benefits.description: Our required password protection keeps your data in VaultChat encrypted and protected, even if your device is unlocked. Multiple incorrect attempts will erase all data.

benefits.title: Multi-Layer Encryption
benefits.description: Incoming and outgoing communications are end-to-end encrypted and transmitted over an encrypted network. All data stored on the device is protected and encrypted.

valutChat.information: Vault Chat, application for encrypted and private communications
faq: What is VaultChat?
What is the difference between VaultChat and VaultSecure?
What are the advantages of using VaultChat?

nordVpn.description: Get simple and secure remote access from the world's most trusted VPN brand.

benefits.title: Third-party authentication
benefits.description: Connect to NordVPN Teams with your existing business credentials. Our VPN solutions for small businesses and large corporations offer third-party authentication with Azure AD, Google, and Okta.

benefits.title: One click to secure any device
benefits.description: It takes just one click to encrypt all data traffic on your device. Click on any gateway to connect or enable the auto-connect feature.

benefits.title: Kill Switch
benefits.description: Don't risk exposing any of your data by enabling the Kill Switch feature. It automatically cuts off all internet traffic on your device if the connection to the server drops even for a second.

benefits.title: Encrypted Data at Rest
benefits.description: All data stored in VaultChat is encrypted using a custom encrypted database with AES-256.

benefits.title: Password Protection
benefits.description: Our required password protection keeps your data in VaultChat encrypted and protected, even if your device is unlocked. Multiple incorrect attempts will erase all data.

benefits.title: Multi-Layer Encryption
benefits.description: Incoming and outgoing communications are end-to-end encrypted and transmitted over an encrypted network. All data stored on the device is protected and encrypted.

salt.description: Keep your most sensitive communications secure with the best shielding

elements.title: Chat
elements.description: Our tailored solution offers users private and secure real-time messaging and group chat functionality to their Salt contacts.

elements.title: Message self-destruction
elements.description: Our self-destruct functionality allows users to erase information from their device and all recipients' devices, either manually or via a timer setting.

elements.title: Message broadcasting
elements.description: Efficiently send live alerts or share messages, images, and documents with large groups of users within an organization

elements.title: Screenshot protection
elements.description: For added internal security, administrators can restrict users' ability to take screenshots. If screenshots are taken, users will receive a notification.

benefits.title: Secure remote work enablement
benefits.description: Many high-profile organizations worldwide have implemented Salt to ensure the highest level of security in communications while working remotely.

benefits.title: Agnostic encryption
benefits.description: Salt uses the latest and best encryption protocols to ensure we offer customers the highest level of encryption within our platform.

benefits.title: Security testing transparency
benefits.description: Salt is an open and trusted technology that is rigorously and routinely verified by independent parties.

elements.description: Individual or group chat, all you need is a browser.

elements.title: Audio and Video Conference
elements.description: Perfect audio and image quality. You will be surprised by this type of virtual reality! Save travel expenses and contact your team with a single click.

elements.title: File transfer between users
elements.description: Send any file format to your chat partners. Access to hardware features such as mobile camera, microphone, data, network status, sensors such as GPS, etc.

elements.title: Calls and video calls
elements.description: VNCmeet, as part of VNCtalk, allows you to initiate video calls with external invited users, who do not need a VNCtalk subscription.

benefits.title: Encryption
benefits.description: End-to-end encryption for maximum privacy and secrecy in your communications.

benefits.title: Works on mobile devices
benefits.description: No need to use a portable or desktop laptop. VNCtalk runs on any browser and as an application.

benefits.title: Whiteboards
benefits.description: Collaborate on whiteboards with images, shapes, and text.

benefits.title: VNCtalk is also an OEM product.
benefits.description: That means partners can add their logo, CD / CI and at the same time modify the interface from a UX (user experience) perspective.

benefits.title: VNCtalk has no advertising
benefits.description: and is equipped with a number of interesting features such as: screen sharing, document collaboration in VNCpads and many more.

benefits.title: VNCtalk is scalable
benefits.description: up to a large number of users. Simply improve the bandwidth, add more instances and you're done.

functionalities.title: VNC Talk Web Application
functionalities.description: VNCtalk Web Client allows you to access all VNCtalk professional communication features, such as chat, audio and video conferencing, in the same standard browser as VNCmail or VNCproject. Therefore, you enter your entire workspace with your browser, without having to launch separate applications for each activity you would like to perform. VNCtalk Web Client runs on any standard browser on Windows, MacOS and Linux.

functionalities.title: VNC Talk Desktop Application
functionalities.description: VNCtalk Desktop Client allows you to run VNCtalk as a separate application on your desktop PC, on Windows, Mac and Linux. Especially when working with many open browser tabs, it is useful to have separate access points for your chats, video conferences and VNCpads. And, of course, you have all VNCtalk features available in any of our frontend clients.

items.question: What is the Threema application for?
items.answer: Threema is a secure messaging app that protects your privacy and allows you to send encrypted messages, make voice calls, and share files.

items.question: How does the Threema application work?
items.answer: Threema uses end-to-end encryption to ensure that only the sender and receiver can read the messages. It does not require a phone number or email for registration.

items.question: How good is the security and privacy of the Threema application?
items.answer: Threema is recognized for its high level of security and data protection. It does not collect personal information and its servers are located in Switzerland.

items.question: What is an MDM?
items.answer: An MDM (Mobile Device Management) is a solution that allows you to manage, monitor, and secure mobile devices such as smartphones or tablets within an organization.

items.question: Does MDM have access to location and other device data?
items.answer: Yes, an MDM can access data such as location, app usage, network used, and other device parameters, depending on the configured policies.

items.question: What are the advantages of using an MDM?
items.answer: Key advantages include enhanced security, remote control, data loss protection, and compliance with corporate policies on devices.

items.question: How is a Cryptcom phone encrypted?
items.answer: Encryption is performed through a specialized process that transforms your device into a highly secure one with modified software and hardware.

items.question: What functionalities will I get by encrypting my phone with Cryptcom?
items.answer: You will gain access to tools such as secure messaging, encrypted vault, automatic IMEI switching, and advanced protection features.

items.question: How does remote wipe work on an encrypted phone like Cryptcom?
items.answer: You can activate remote wipe in case of loss or theft. The system erases all data on the device to prevent unauthorized access.

benefits.title: Our devices come with exclusive programs and apps

elements.title: Private Network
elements.description: We use multiple networks for our platforms. All our servers are installed separately and are not tied to a device, account, or app.

elements.title: Protection
elements.description: All devices are protected against brute force and cannot be hacked. If necessary, we can remotely wipe your device.

elements.title: Encryption
elements.description: We use the highest encryption for each feature. These cannot be deciphered without your keys and passwords. You control your privacy.

elements.title: On-Device Encryption Keys
elements.description: Your encryption keys for email, chat, and calls are generated on your device. These keys never leave the device and can be regenerated at any time.

elements.title: Device Security Manager
elements.description: All devices are monitored by our security system. There is no possible way to hack, penetrate, or send malware or viruses. If necessary, we can remotely wipe a device and leave no trace.

elements.title: Release and Updates
elements.description: We update and improve our products, and we continue to release new updates regularly.

elements.title: Encrypted Emails
elements.description: PGP Email for communicating with other providers. All emails are not stored on our server, and the encryption keys are generated on your device. You have complete control.

elements.title: PGP Email
elements.description: PGP Mail is one of the most widely used encrypted communication methods. We've built this app so that you also control your keys. Messages are stored on your device, not on the server. You can delete them at any time, and they're gone forever.

elements.title: Encrypted Calls
elements.description: Call your contacts securely within VaultChat. No interference or traces of the phone call. We use the highest possible encryption to keep your conversations private.

elements.title: Encrypted Calls
elements.description: We use the highest possible encryption, the ZRTP protocol implemented with our additional authentication and AES. We've built a platform and independent gateways to keep your conversations private.

mobileFeatures.nfcBlockingText: Blocks wireless, Bluetooth, and NFC to prevent access.
mobileFeatures.anonymityText: Protects information and apps running in the background.

questions.question: On which device can I install the Elyon app?
questions.answer: The Elyon app is available for Android and iOS devices.

questions.question: What is the cost of the Elyon app?
questions.answer: The cost varies depending on the selected license. You can check updated pricing on our official website.

questions.question: Can I be spied on while using the Elyon app?
questions.answer: No. Elyon protects your privacy through end-to-end encryption and strict security policies.

product.title: SecureCrypt
product.description: SecureCrypt uses decentralized global servers that self-destruct every 24 hours. This approach prevents any data from being stored on your device.

benefits.title: Keep your privacy intact with maximum protection

features.endToEndEncryption: Decentralized global servers that self-destruct every 24 hours. No server stores data permanently, eliminating unauthorized access risks.
features.chatHiding: In emergencies, immediately sends alerts to your trusted contacts. Provides key information to act quickly in critical situations.
features.privateCalls: Activate a secure response with a secondary password. Delete data and protect your information without alerting the intruder, offering discreet and effective defense.

mobileFeatures.hiddenAppsText: SecureCrypt encryption protocol uses 512-bit ECC, equivalent to RSA 15,360 bits. New ECC keys for each message.
mobileFeatures.manipulationProtectionText: Enable burn mode for messages so that sent messages self-destruct from both sender and recipient devices.
mobileFeatures.nfcBlockingText: Share files securely and safely, preventing unauthorized access.
mobileFeatures.anonymityText: Secure voice communication with end-to-end encryption, protecting the privacy of your conversations.

features.feature1: Stealth Mode: Hide applications behind a functional calculator to keep your data invisible and secure.
features.feature2: Secure Voice Changer: Transform your voice in real time during voice or video recordings, guaranteeing total anonymity.
features.feature3: Vault Access Code: Add an extra security layer to access the encrypted vault.
features.feature4: Remote Deletion: Irreversibly delete data and overwrite the secure container with zeros.
features.feature5: Chat Masking: Replace chats with random text in seconds, hiding confidential conversations.
features.feature6: Shake Device Lock: Shake your device to quickly lock the app in critical situations.

questions.question: What files can I protect with SecureCrypt?
questions.answer: You can protect messages, files, contacts, and voice calls. All your information is end-to-end encrypted.

questions.question: Why should I use SecureCrypt in my company?
questions.answer: Because it offers maximum security, intrusion protection, and full encryption, preventing corporate information leaks.

questions.question: Why should I use an encrypted app like SecureCrypt instead of a conventional one?
questions.answer: Conventional apps don't offer real protection against spying; SecureCrypt guarantees absolute privacy and confidentiality.

product.title: SecureCrypt
product.description: SecureCrypt utiliza servidores globales descentralizados que se autodestruyen cada 24 horas. Este enfoque evita que datos se guarden en tu móvil.

benefits.title: Mantén tu privacidad intacta con la máxima protección

features.endToEndEncryption: Servidores globales descentralizados que se autodestruyen cada 24 horas. Ningún servidor almacena datos permanentemente, eliminando riesgos de acceso no autorizados.
features.chatHiding: En emergencias, envía alertas inmediatas a tus contactos de confianza. Proporciona información clave para actuar rápidamente en situaciones críticas.
features.privateCalls: Activa una respuesta segura con una contraseña secundaria. Elimina datos y protege tu información sin alertar al intruso, brindando una defensa discreta y efectiva.

mobileFeatures.hiddenAppsText: El protocolo de encriptación SecureCrypt usa encriptación ECC de 512 bits, equivalente a RSA de 15,360 bits. Nuevas claves ECC para cada mensaje.
mobileFeatures.manipulationProtectionText: Habilita el modo de quema de mensajes para que los mensajes enviados se autodestruyan tanto desde el dispositivo del remitente como del destinatario.
mobileFeatures.nfcBlockingText: Comparte archivos de forma segura y protegida sin riesgo de acceso no autorizado.
mobileFeatures.anonymityText: Comunicación de voz segura con cifrado extremo a extremo, protegiendo la privacidad de tus conversaciones.

features.feature1: Modo Sigiloso: Oculta aplicaciones detrás de una calculadora funcional para mantener tus datos invisibles y seguros.
features.feature2: Cambiador de Voz Seguro: Transforma tu voz en tiempo real durante grabaciones de voz o video, garantizando anonimato total.
features.feature3: Código de Acceso de la Bóveda: Agrega una capa adicional de seguridad para acceder a la bóveda encriptada.
features.feature4: Eliminación Remota: Elimina datos de forma irreversible y rescribe el contenedor seguro con ceros.
features.feature5: Enmascaramiento de Chat: Reemplaza chats con texto aleatorio en segundos, ocultando conversaciones confidenciales.
features.feature6: Bloqueo del Dispositivo al Agitar: Agita tu dispositivo para bloquear la aplicación rápidamente en situaciones críticas.

questions.question: ¿Qué archivos puedo proteger con la Aplicación SecureCrypt?
questions.answer: Puedes proteger mensajes, archivos, contactos y llamadas de voz. Toda tu información viaja cifrada de extremo a extremo.

questions.question: ¿Por qué debería usar la aplicación SecureCrypt en mi empresa?
questions.answer: Porque ofrece máxima seguridad, protección contra intrusiones y cifrado total, evitando fugas de información corporativa.

questions.question: ¿Por qué debería usar una aplicación cifrada como SecureCrypt en vez de una convencional?
questions.answer: Las apps convencionales no ofrecen protección real ante espionaje, SecureCrypt garantiza privacidad y confidencialidad absoluta.
